title: Neon Enchantment
description: A high-fantasy world where medieval elements clash with a retrofuturistic, synthwave aesthetic. Amidst the magical landscapes and neon lights, players unravel the enigmas behind the Wizzards, a group weaving a spellbinding plot of control through magic and technology.

chapters.title: Chapter One: Neon Shadows
chapters.summary: Investigate the Wizzards' influence in Duskspire City and uncover their manipulation tactics.

areas.name: Duskspire City
areas.description: A bustling port city blending medieval architecture with synthwave neon lighting.

locations.name: The Glittergut Tavern
locations.description: A seedy gathering spot for rumors and gigs, frequented by all manner of patrons.

npcs.name: Lance Hightide
npcs.description: Possessing valuable local intel and deeply concerned about the mysterious disappearances in the city.

npcs.name: Cynthia Glowglen
npcs.description: Cunning and secretive, she navigates both sides, delivering messages and covert secrets.

locations.name: Skyvault District
locations.description: Wealthy district with a glowing tower suspected of harboring Wizzard activities.

npcs.name: Marix "The Shadow" Illuna
npcs.description: Claims to have infiltrated a Wizzard facility and offers insights and information for the right price.

chapters.title: Chapter Two: The Party's Over
chapters.summary: Expose the propaganda and machinations of the Wizzards during a grand festival.

areas.name: Starlight Plaza
areas.description: A grand amphitheater serving as a stage for festivals and public spectacles orchestrated by the Wizzards.

locations.name: Starlight Plaza
locations.description: A place of celebration and propaganda, filled with dramatic performances and gladiatorial games.

npcs.name: Orin Brightflare
npcs.description: Charismatic yet ruthless, supervising the festival and maintaining the facade among the masses.

npcs.name: Gladiax
npcs.description: Conflicted and powerful, Gladiax conceals his disdain for the Wizzards beneath a veil of performance.

npcs.name: Selena Underveil
npcs.description: Uses her position to gather intelligence on the Wizzards' plans and aid the party from within the festivities.

areas.name: Duskspire City
areas.description: A city alive with the hum of magical technology and bathed in neon hues, pivotal in the Wizzards’ plans.

locations.name: The Glittergut Tavern
locations.description: A hub of secrets, where various schemers exchange news and where the whispers of the street come alive.

npcs.name: Lance Hightide
npcs.description: A former soldier, gruff but kind, with a wealth of knowledge about the criminal and political undercurrents in the city.

locations.name: Skyvault District
locations.description: An area of wealth and opulence, closely guarded and serving as a frontline for the Wizzards' operations.

npcs.name: Cynthia Glowglen
npcs.description: Maneuvers through the shadows, passing critical information under the watchful eyes of both allies and enemies.
